overview_of_class: This class will involve a close reading of Kierkegaard's Concluding Unscientific Postscript with particular attention to the theme of indirect communication and the various philosophical reasons one might think it necessary to engage in such indirection. The central question of the course: are there are philosophic insights that cannot be directly conveyed by discourse? If there are such insights, what are the other options for communicating them?
name: Special Topics In Philosophy
subject: PHIL
